casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Battease, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Battease, 116 Ohio St.3d 1207, 2007-Ohio-6457.]

(No. 2007-0157 Submitted November 28, 2007 Decided December 11, 2007.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Philip R. Cummings, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Schuh & Goldberg, L.L.P., and Richard J. Goldberg, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently accepted.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. O’Donnell, J., dissents.
